subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Anthony Reyes ended a 12-game regular-season losing streak last night that began last September, helping the host St. Louis Cardinals defeat the Milwaukee Brewers, 5-2, to sweep a doubleheader.
snippet: Anthony Reyes ended a 12-game regular-season losing streak last night that began last September, helping the host St. Louis Cardinals defeat the Milwaukee Brewers, 5-2, to sweep a doubleheader.
